data.title: Canadian Personalities
data.text:
LINKS

"Pierre Elliott Trudeau". The Canadian Encyclopedia.

http://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.com/index.cfm?PgNm=

TCE&Params=A1ARTA0008141

Library and Archives Canada. First among Equals:

The Prime Minister in Canadian Life and Politics.

"The Right Honourable Pierre Elliott Trudeau".

http://www.collectionscanada.ca/primeministers/h4-3375-e.html

Library and Archives Canada. First among Equals:

The Prime Minister in Canadian Life and Politics (kids). "Pierre Elliott Trudeau".

http://www.collectionscanada.ca/primeministers/kids/h9-3380-e.html

CBC Archives. Prime Ministers' Gallery. "Pierre Elliott Trudeau:

Swinger, Philosopher, Prime Minister".

http://archives.cbc.ca/IDD-1-73-2192/politics_economy/trudeau/

CBC. The Greatest Canadian. "Top Ten Great Canadians: Pierre Elliott Trudeau".

http://www.cbc.ca/greatest/top_ten/nominee/trudeau-pierre.html

The Pierre Elliott Trudeau Foundation. Pierre Elliott Trudeau.

http://www.trudeaufoundation.ca/trudeaufoundation/about/pet?l=en

BOOKS

English, John. Citizen of the World: The Life of Pierre Elliott Trudeau.

Toronto: Vintage Canada, 2007.

Cook, Ramsay. The Teeth of Time: Remembering Pierre Elliott Trudeau.

Montreal: McGill-Queen's University Press, 2006.

Nemni, Max and Monique Nemni. Young Trudeau: Son of Quebec,

Father of Canada, 1919-1944. Toronto: McClelland & Stewart, 2006.

Sauerwein, Stan. Pierre Elliott Trudeau: The Fascinating Life of Canada's Most Flamboyant Prime Minister. Canmore, Alberta: Altitude Publishing, 2004.

Cohen, Andrew and J. L. Granatstein, eds. Trudeau's Shadow: The Life and Legacy of Pierre Elliott Trudeau. Toronto: Vintage Canada, 1999.
